name: Millennial Pearl Seahorse
storytext: One of the two sovereigns standing at the apex of the Fontemer Aberrants. Poets and authors view it as a proud and noble creature, thus bestowing it with its high-flown title.
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Millennial Pearl Seahorse
